Package com.RPG.Core

Interface MonsterLootFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArmorFactory, BackpackFactory, MoneyPouchFactory, WeaponFactory
public interface MonsterLootFactory
interface for creating basic Items
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ben Demets

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Item
    createItem(Monster owner, AnchorPoint anchorPoint)
    Creates A basic Item

  • Method Details

    • createItem

      @Raw Item createItem(Monster owner, AnchorPoint anchorPoint) throws InvalidValueException, InvalidHolderException
      Creates A basic Item
      Parameters:
      owner - owner of the Item
      anchorPoint - anchorPoint we want to attach the item to
      Returns:
      the created Item
      Throws:
      InvalidValueException - shouldn't Happen
      InvalidHolderException - gets Thrown when owner isn't valid 
      !owner.isValidHolder
